SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "CheckInByAgentAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@UNIX
! Add Agent connection details : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_AGENT_CONNECTION@UNIX
!Project Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_PROJECT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -projectname &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!State Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_STATE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#, " -statename &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Process Name : IF &UC4RB_HRV_PROCESS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_PROCESS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -processname &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Package Name : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_PACKAGE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -pkgname &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Check in Path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_CHECKIN_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -clientpath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! View Path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_VIEW_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -viewpath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Check-in Mode : SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PRV.VARA.CHECKIN_MODE" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_ATTRIBUTE# = &UC4RB_HRV_CHECKIN_MODE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ITERATE_VARA : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -cimode &ATTRIBUTE#")
! Check-in Item Filter Option : SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PRV.VARA.ITEM_FILTER_OPTIONS" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_ATTRIBUTE# = &UC4RB_HRV_ITEM_FILTER# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ITERATE_VARA : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -ciitemfilter &ATTRIBUTE#")
! Item Path Options : SET &ATTRIBUTE_VARA# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PRV.VARA.ITEM_PATH_OPTIONS" : SET &UC4RB_HRV_ATTRIBUTE# = &UC4RB_HRV_PATH_OPTION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ITERATE_VARA : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -cipathoption &ATTRIBUTE#")
! List Of Files or Folders to Check-in : IF &UC4RB_HRV_CONTENT_LIST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_CONTENT_LIST# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -files &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Description : IF &UC4RB_HRV_CHECKIN_DESC# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_HRV_CHECKIN_DESC# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -desc &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Recursive : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -recursive &UC4RB_HRV_RECURSIVE#")
! Delete After Check-in : SET &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_HRV_CMD# , " -dltafterci &UC4RB_HRV_DELETE_AFTER_CI#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_HRV_CMD#
&UC4RB_HRV_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CHECKIN BY AGENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CHECKIN BY AGENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_HARVEST.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
